_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: IoQuake 3 With E+
author: thomasbonsirven@gmail.com
startup: ./ioq3ded.x86_64 +set net_port {{SERVER_PORT}} set dedicated 2 +map {{GAME_MAP}} set g_gametype 3 sv_pure 0

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# dirty install script for ioquake3
# will get updated more later

apt update -y
apt install -y wget unzip git build-essential

if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
	mkdir -p /mnt/server/
fi

cd /mnt/server/

wget http://www.openarena.ws/request.php?4 -O ioquake3-linux.zip

unzip -o ioquake3-linux.zip ioquake3 

mv -f ioquake3/* /mnt/server/

rm -rf ioquake3/ openarena.zip

variables.name: Game Map
variables.description:
The map to load when the server starts.
See here for all maps available by default - https://openarena.fandom.com/wiki/Maps
